title: Light sync fails to find peers to sync from
body:
Running:
```
geth --syncmode light --datadir ~/Library/Ethereum --keystore ~/Library/Ethereum/keystore --rpc --rpccorsdomain=* --port 30303
```

Ends up unable to find peers and thus cannot sync any data.

#### System information

Geth
Version: 1.9.24-stable
Git Commit: cc05b050df5f88e80bb26aaf6d2f339c49c2d702
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [65 64 63]
Go Version: go1.15.5
Operating System: darwin

OS & Version: OSX 10.15.6

#### Expected behaviour

Node should find peers and sync data.

#### Actual behaviour

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Run:

```
geth --syncmode light --datadir ~/Library/Ethereum --keystore ~/Library/Ethereum/keystore --rpc --rpccorsdomain=* --port 30303
```

And notice that upon `geth attach` we attach at `block: 0` and there is no activity on the geth node.
